language.value: Verwijdert user accounts die reeds gedeactiveerd zijn. Alle resources van het account worden opgeruimd.
Removes a user account completely form the network, including resources such as mailbox and home/profile folders
Please enter or select a value
Please enter or select a value
All operations have been executed succesfuly
Weet u zeker dat het geselecteerde account inclusief alle bijbehorende resources kan worden verwijderd?
Are you sure you want to deprovision the user account including all of its resources?
